content:
Give agents access to Service Cloud by assigning them a permission set.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on.

To assign permission sets: Assign Permission Sets.
To view object permissions: View Setup and Configuration.
To edit object permissions: Manage Profiles and Permission Sets, Customize Application.

Select agents to use Service Cloud. Assign them the Service Replies User permission set, included with the Service Cloud Einstein add-on license.

Recommendations appear in the Einstein Replies component. Users with the Einstein Reply Recommendations User permission set get the component on Chat and Messaging console pages.

To customize the Einstein Replies component: open the Chat and Messaging pages in the Lightning App Builder, update settings for each layout.

SEE ALSO: Manage Permission Set Assignments, Create and Configure Lightning Experience Record Pages.
title: Granting Agents Access to Service Cloud Replies
